description.data: Offering the aroma of freshly baked blueberry muffins with a sweet, light berry taste, Pinnacle Blueberry Vodka adds a juicy sweetness to your favorite fruit drink, punch or lemonade. For a refreshing twist to a classic, try a Pinnacle® Blueberry Lemonade cocktail by mixing one part Pinnacle Blueberry Vodka with two parts lemonade with ice and drop in a few fresh blueberries for an extra burst of berry flavor. Try a Pinnacle Fuzzy Blueberry by combining two parts Pinnacle Blueberry Vodka with one-half part DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps and one-half part cranberry juice. Shake with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lemon wedge. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Fresh bitter berries with a hint of vanilla.

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Plata Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Plata is made from 100% blue agave for a smooth-tasting plata tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring playful citrus notes along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Plata Tequila also offers a short but smooth finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita or Paloma, Hornitos Plata delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

tastingNotesText.data: Agave forward with citrus notes

description.data: Maker’s Mark Private Select Experience is more than just choosing your own barrel of whisky. It’s a one-of-a-kind bourbon experience that allows you to follow the process Bill Samuels, Jr., used when he created Maker’s 46®. After a day at the distillery, you and your guests will leave with the satisfaction that you’ve customized* a bourbon combination that is truly Maker’s Mark – and truly your own.OUR MAKER’S MARK PRIVATE SELECT TASTE PROFILE*These five staves can be combined in 1,001 ways to create your own personal expression;-  Baked American Pure 2:   Sweet Brown Vanilla, Caramel, Brown Spice-  Seared French Cuvée:   Oakey, Caramel, Roasted/Toasted-  Maker’s 46:   Dried Fruit, Vanilla, Spice-  Roasted French Mocha:   Char, Maple, Cacao-  Toasted French Spice:   Smoke, Coumarin, Spice

tastingNotesText.data: Accounts get to select their exact taste profile by selecting the combination of French oak staves used for finishing

text.data: A unique combination of wood staves is selected to finish the Cask Strength Bourbon to create a completely distinctive expression of Maker's Mark
After aging 5 3/4 to 7 years to become cask strength Maker's Mark Bourbon, Private Selection is created by adding 10 custom wood finishing staves to each barrel
Private Selection is finished for 9 weeks in cold conditions in barrels with chosen combination of staves
The aging takes place in our limestone cellar to extract a unique, flavorful taste profile

Because there are so many possible expressions of Maker's Mark Private Selection, try it neat, on the rocks or with just a splash of water - this will allow you to experience the nuances the different staves create

description.data: This well-balanced, flavored vodka brings out the best of dark blueberry and bright strawberry. The aroma is a clean blend of sweet, dark berries while the taste bursts with flavors of bold, ripe blueberries and sweet vibrant strawberries. Add a clean, fruity punch to a fresh Pinnacle Triple Berry Tart cocktail by shaking with ice, two parts Pinnacle Berry Vodka with one-part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur, one part cranberry juice and a splash of fresh lime juice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cherry. For a new twist on a brunch classic, try a Pinnacle Berry Screwdriver by mixing one part Pinnacle Berry Vodka with two parts orange juice and ice, garnish with an orange slice. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet fruity and vibrant.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon
An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined, and smooth character
With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla and oak flavor with a lightly sweet finish
Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball

description.data: An exquisite blend of rums aged two to four years in charred oak casks, Cruzan Aged Dark Rum delivers a smooth, medium-bodied, aromatic taste with every slow sip. Rich in color and texture, this rum offers an exceptionally clean and robust taste. Enjoy this rum on the rocks or mixed with tonic or cola for a refreshing cocktail. Try a Mango Hurricane by combining one part each Cruzan® Mango and Aged Dark Rum and orange juice with ice in a hurricane glass. Add a splash of grenadine and garnish with an orange wedge and a cherry. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Crafted with extracts of blackberries blended with fine brandy, DeKuyper Blackberry Flavored Brandy makes a mouthwatering treat. Only the finest fruits are selected and specially blended to bring out the full-bodied blackberry taste. Sip it on its own for a smooth, full-bodied drink or balance your favorite cocktails with its deep blackberry flavor. Perfect in any season, accentuate the flavors of fall by blending it with a pint of hard apple cider or a Bramble in summer, melding its berry taste with gin, fresh lemon juice and sugar syrup. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and tart and tangy flavor of fresh cherries.

description.data: About five years ago, my dad asked me if I was sure that making bourbon was what I wanted to do. I didn’t hesitate -- I said yes. Then he asked me what I wanted to do at the distillery and I said “everything.” I’ve always been told I had a strong dose of my granddaddy Booker in my veins – a real fascination with tinkering. It was when I was exploring all the different departments that I realized it myself. During my time at what we call the Global Innovation Center, I was drawn to the practically limitless palate of tastes and flavors created by blending different aged spirits. My fascination became a passion, and I like to think that my granddad’s spirit of experimentation lives on in me today in my love of blending whiskey. After a while, I asked the company if I could come up with my own whiskey. I knew right away that this would be the foundation for my first release, Little Book. The name “Little Book” was the nickname given to me by my family when I was younger. I’m proud to honor my granddad and our family with this name. Little Book will be an annual limited release series that will feature new, unique blends that I’ve crafted and blended, uncut and unfiltered, in honor of my granddaddy, Booker Noe. Why blending? Blending offers an open canvas. Plenty of people are familiar with the taste of Bourbon, or Rye Whiskey or Scotch, but what would happen if these liquids came together? This is the type of question that I set out to answer when I started down this road.- Freddie Noe, 8th Generation Beam Family Distiller

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet grain, vanilla, subtle hints or orange, and a smoky finish.

text.data: Little Book will be an annual limited release series that will feature new, unique blends that I’ve crafted and blended, uncut and unfiltered, in honor of my granddaddy, Booker Noe
Why blending? Blending offers an open canvas Plenty of people are familiar with the taste of Bourbon, or Rye Whiskey or Scotch, but what would happen if these liquids came together?
Crafting this bourbon wasn't as difficult as previous years, because I had such a strong vision for the blend going into the liquid selection
In total, we teased 22 different blends in comparison to previous chapters where we teased more than 60

The base of the blend is a Kentucky Straight Brown Rice Bourbon The "High Rye" rye whiskey is an ode to Booker's Rye Ultimately, with the help of my father, we chose the 3rd liquid as a Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey

description.data: The perfect introduction to Irish whiskey, Kilbeggan Traditional Blended Irish Whiskey is both complex and approachable. Its robust flavors of peach, almond nougat, vanilla and caramel are likely to appeal to seasoned whiskey drinkers, too.This truly versatile drink can be sipped neat, on the rocks, enjoyed with a refreshing filler or in a cocktail. Try a Kilbeggan Irish Coffee for an after-dinner treat. Simply mix 1.5 parts of Kilbeggan with a tablespoon of brown sugar syrup and three parts of freshly brewed dark roast coffee. Garnish with a dollop of fresh whip cream, and feel the warmth of Irish tradition.While many Irish whiskies are triple distilled, Kilbeggan Traditional Blended Irish Whiskey is double-distilled. This gives the resulting spirit a robust body with plenty of character. It's then blended with carefully selected malt and grain whiskies to create a smooth, round texture.The Kilbeggan Distillery is the oldest continuously licensed in Ireland, and to this day whiskey is still made in the building which predates the introduction of electricity. First opened in 1757, it spend two centuries making whiskey enjoyed around the world. During a short, three-decade hiatus, it was the townspeople of Kilbeggan who kept the license alive — and finally reopened the doors to reintroduce the world to this distinctive Irish spirit.

tastingNotesText.data: A soft smooth entry leads to sweet golden raisin, caramel and peppery spice flavours

text.data: Traditionally double-distilled for a more characterful flavor

Authentic and approachable, the perfect introduction to Irish whiskey

description.data: Take time to stop and smell the coconuts. Cruzan Coconut Rum smoothly blends high-quality rum with the natural, creamy flavor of coconut. The sweet, rich coconut flavor is a must-have for your piña colada and is also perfect for summer cocktails featuring tropical flavors like mango, pineapple, and banana. For a tropical twist on a classic, try a piña colada martini by combining one part each of Cruzan Coconut and Pineapple rums in a mixing glass with ice. Add a splash of pineapple juice, stir and strain into a martini glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, rich coconut with a clean taste.

description.data: As close as it gets without shimmying up a palm tree, this fresh coconut vodka mixes with clean, toasty notes. Offering an aroma of a smooth shaved, buttery coconut, Pinnacle Coconut Vodka tastes like straight vanilla and toasted coconut. Add a tropical twist to your favorite cola or punch and create one-of-a-kind vodka drinks. Enjoy a Pinnacle Coconut Spritzer by mixing one part Pinnacle Coconut Vodka, two parts club soda and a splash of pineapple juice with ice and a pineapple garnish. Try a Pinnacle Orange Coco-Naut Cosmos cocktail by shaking one part Pinnacle Coconut Vodka with one part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur and two parts orange juice with ice. Strain into a chilled coconut-rimmed martini glass and enjoy. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet tropical and smooth.

description.data: Versatile with a quintessential apricot taste, DeKuyper Apricot Flavored Brandy is essential for classic and modern cocktails. Made with premium apricot distillate blended with crushed fruit kernels and quality brandy, this fine apricot brandy is the essence of summer. Considered an aphrodisiac in Europe for centuries, the apricot's luscious curves, juicy flesh and sweet taste led people to believe that eating dried apricots or prunes unleashed the powers of love. Perfect sipping on its own, its fruity flavor shines through in an Apricot Caipirinha, or mingled with fresh lime and orange juice and soda for a refreshing Apricot Fizz. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet with a distinct tart taste. With bold juicy flavor.

description.data: Maker’s Mark Private Select Experience is more than just choosing your own barrel of whisky. It’s a one-of-a-kind bourbon experience that allows you to follow the process Bill Samuels, Jr., used when he created Maker’s 46®. After a day at the distillery, you and your guests will leave with the satisfaction that you’ve customized* a bourbon combination that is truly Maker’s Mark – and truly your own.OUR MAKER’S MARK PRIVATE SELECT TASTE PROFILE*These five staves can be combined in 1,001 ways to create your own personal expression;-  Baked American Pure 2:   Sweet Brown Vanilla, Caramel, Brown Spice-  Seared French Cuvée:   Oakey, Caramel, Roasted/Toasted-  Maker’s 46:   Dried Fruit, Vanilla, Spice-  Roasted French Mocha:   Char, Maple, Cacao-  Toasted French Spice:   Smoke, Coumarin, Spice

tastingNotesText.data: Accounts get to select their exact taste profile by selecting the combination of French oak staves used for finishing

text.data: A unique combination of wood staves is selected to finish the Cask Strength Bourbon to create a completely distinctive expression of Maker's Mark
After aging 5 3/4 to 7 years to become cask strength Maker's Mark Bourbon, Private Selection is created by adding 10 custom wood finishing staves to each barrel
Private Selection is finished for 9 weeks in cold conditions in barrels with chosen combination of staves
The aging takes place in our limestone cellar to extract a unique, flavorful taste profile

Because there are so many possible expressions of Maker's Mark Private Selection, try it neat, on the rocks or with just a splash of water - this will allow you to experience the nuances the different staves create

description.data: Offering the aroma of warm frosting, this bakery-fresh vanilla cake vodka has notes of baked vanilla and buttercream for a sweet confection in your glass. For an indulgent cocktail, mix up a Pinnacle Red Velvet Cake-tini by combining one part Pinnacle Cake Vodka, one part JDK & Sons Crave Chocolate Chili Liqueur, and a splash of grenadine. Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a martini glass with its rim dipped in shaved chocolate, and garnish with fresh strawberries. Or try a simple Pinnacle Limon Cake Fizz by mixing one part Pinnacle Cake Vodka with two parts lemon-lime soda in a glass with ice and a lime wedge garnish. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

description.data: With added vanilla extract, fresh lemon distillate and a touch of caramel, deep gold DeKuyper Amaretto takes this traditional liqueur to the next level. Showcasing a rich, amber color, this liqueur delivers the unmistakable aroma of almonds. Each sip of this complex and versatile liqueur carries sweet almond notes to hot coffee drinks, cold shots and colorful cocktails. Smooth and versatile, drink it on its own or add it to sour mix for a delicious Amaretto Sour. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Reposado Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Reposado is made from 100% blue agave and aged in large oak vats for at least two months for a smooth-tasting tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring notes of apple and herbs along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Reposado Tequila also offers a warm and slightly astringent finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita, Hornitos Reposado delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

tastingNotesText.data: Balanced agave with apple and herbal notes, slightly woody

description.data: About five years ago, my dad asked me if I was sure that making bourbon was what I wanted to do. I didn’t hesitate -- I said yes. Then he asked me what I wanted to do at the distillery and I said “everything.” I’ve always been told I had a strong dose of my granddaddy Booker in my veins – a real fascination with tinkering. It was when I was exploring all the different departments that I realized it myself. During my time at what we call the Global Innovation Center, I was drawn to the practically limitless palate of tastes and flavors created by blending different aged spirits. My fascination became a passion, and I like to think that my granddad’s spirit of experimentation lives on in me today in my love of blending whiskey. After a while, I asked the company if I could come up with my own whiskey. I knew right away that this would be the foundation for my first release, Little Book. The name “Little Book” was the nickname given to me by my family when I was younger. I’m proud to honor my granddad and our family with this name. Little Book will be an annual limited release series that will feature new, unique blends that I’ve crafted and blended, uncut and unfiltered, in honor of my granddaddy, Booker Noe. Why blending? Blending offers an open canvas. Plenty of people are familiar with the taste of Bourbon, or Rye Whiskey or Scotch, but what would happen if these liquids came together? This is the type of question that I set out to answer when I started down this road.- Freddie Noe, 8th Generation Beam Family Distiller

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet grain, vanilla, subtle hints or orange, and a smoky finish.

text.data: Little Book will be an annual limited release series that will feature new, unique blends that I’ve crafted and blended, uncut and unfiltered, in honor of my granddaddy, Booker Noe
Why blending? Blending offers an open canvas Plenty of people are familiar with the taste of Bourbon, or Rye Whiskey or Scotch, but what would happen if these liquids came together?
Crafting this bourbon wasn't as difficult as previous years, because I had such a strong vision for the blend going into the liquid selection
In total, we teased 22 different blends in comparison to previous chapters where we teased more than 60

The base of the blend is a Kentucky Straight Brown Rice Bourbon The "High Rye" rye whiskey is an ode to Booker's Rye Ultimately, with the help of my father, we chose the 3rd liquid as a Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey

description.data: A light citrusy aroma carries through this lightly-whipped orange vodka. Mix it with lemon-lime club soda to create a soft, fizzy dreamsicle treat or whip up your own unique vodka drinks. Create a Pinnacle Orange Cream Martini by combining two parts Pinnacle Orange Whipped Vodka, one part DeKuyper White Crème de Cacao Liqueur and two parts orange juice. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass with an orange wedge garnish. Or try a refreshing Pinnacle Orange Cranberry Whip cocktail by mixing one part each Pinnacle Orange Whipped Vodka, orange juice and cranberry juice in a glass with ice garnished with an orange slice. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Creamy orange delight with a hint of sweetness.

description.data: An exquisite blend of rums aged two to four years in charred oak casks, Cruzan Aged Dark Rum delivers a smooth, medium-bodied, aromatic taste with every slow sip. Rich in color and texture, this rum offers an exceptionally clean and robust taste. Enjoy this rum on the rocks or mixed with tonic or cola for a refreshing cocktail. Try a Mango Hurricane by combining one part each Cruzan® Mango and Aged Dark Rum and orange juice with ice in a hurricane glass. Add a splash of grenadine and garnish with an orange wedge and a cherry. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Looking for a whisky that's free from conventions? You've found it. Auchentoshan American Oak Single Malt Scotch Whisky is a smooth yet lively dram that fits in just as well on a rooftop bar as it does by a roaring pub fire. Thanks to the influence of American oak barrels, the classic smooth, lively and citrus-zesty flavour of Auchentoshan is softened with flavours of vanilla and coconut. This super-smooth and versatile malt whisky can stand up on its own over ice, as a chaser in an Auchentoshan & Ale, or as an offbeat addition to cocktails that wouldn't normally call for single malt in. We told you it was unconventional. While others distill single malts twice, Auchentoshan is triple-distilled for extra smoothness. This American Oak version is left to age in ex-bourbon barrels. This makes it even more mellow; it's also where it picks up telltale flavours of vanilla and coconut. These creamy flavours are the perfect complement to the white peach, sugared grapefruit and hint of spice that make Auchentoshan whisky so unique. Made on the outskirts of Glasgow, Auchentoshan is an urban single malt. The vibrancy of Scotland's second city has influenced its innovation for more than 200 years. Launched in 1823, the distillery has seen it all: from the industrial revolution and WWII bombings to the art and music movements of the late 20th Century. Auchentoshan American Oak Single Malt Scotch Whisky is an award winner, and recently took Gold at the International Spirits Challenge 2020. In previous years (2017 and 2018) it won silver at the International Wine & Spirit Competition.

tastingNotesText.data: Refreshingly smooth yet lively with vanilla cream, coconut and white peach

description.data: Jim Beam Kentucky Fire is rooted in Jim Beam’s bourbon heritage, but delivers a new, fiery, sweet kick backed by the mellow smokiness of bourbon whiskey. If you’re looking to spice things up, Jim Beam Kentucky Fire is just the ticket. Our distillers created this signature mix of red-hot cinnamon liqueur and the world’s finest Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey. With a fiery hot candied cinnamon flavor and notes of oaky, smooth bourbon fire up any drink with a touch of sweet spice. Plus, it makes for one heck of a shot.

description.data: Tres Generaciones Plata Tequila is a triple-distilled tequila made from 100% hand-selected blue agave. Tres Generaciones Plata is an un-aged, crystal clear tequila with a unique, pure agave taste and background of herbs. This plata tequila features a clean, cool finish with lingering white pepper. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in classic cocktails. Tres Generaciones Plata offers clean, smooth flavor in every sip. Combine with grapefruit soda for an elevated paloma, or enjoy simply with soda water and lime to experience the layered flavor this tequila offers. Each bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

description.data: Cruzan Tropical Fruit Rum is the perfect addition to the best rum punch on your block this summer. It offers a sweet cherry punch with hints of citrus and vanilla. Mix up a Cruzan Undertow cocktail by combining one part Cruzan Tropical Fruit Rum, two parts ginger beer and the juice of half of a lime over crushed ice. Garnish with the shell of the lime and enjoy. Or try a simple Cruzan Island Mixer by combining one part Cruzan Tropical Fruit Rum with three parts lemon lime soda over ice in a tall glass and garnish with a lime wedge. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s.

description.data: Pinnacle Strawberry Vodka offers an aroma of delicious sweet strawberry along with hints of vanilla and berries. On the palate, enjoy strawberry cream flavors with a pleasant and lingering tart strawberry finish. Try a Strawberry Spritzer cocktail by combining one-part Pinnacle Strawberry Vodka, three parts white wine, and one-part club soda over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a strawberry slice or lemon wedge. Or for an adult twist on a summer classic, enjoy a Pinnacle Strawberry Lemonade by adding one-part Pinnacle Strawberry Vodka, two parts lemonade and a splash of lemon-lime soda over ice in a tall glass with a strawberry slice or lemon wedge. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, ripe strawberry with a hint of vanilla.

description.data: Sweet as honey. Bold as bourbon.Jim Beam Honey opens a smooth chapter in the Jim Beam legend with complex notes of caramel, oak, vanilla and a finish of sweet honey. Made with Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey slowly infused with natural golden honey to produce a sophisticated, deep, rich flavor with honey aroma, it stays true to the secret family recipe of Jim Beam.Sweet but not too sweet, Jim Beam Honey has the perfect touch of golden honey allowing its warming sweetness to shine without losing the mellow smoothness of our original bourbon. So whether you’re craving a cocktail with a sweeter side or an easy sipper, this is the bee’s knees. After seven generations of master distillers, the Jim Beam family tradition continues today with Jim Beam Honey and more. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon

description.data: About five years ago, my dad asked me if I was sure that making bourbon was what I wanted to do. I didn’t hesitate -- I said yes. Then he asked me what I wanted to do at the distillery and I said “everything.” I’ve always been told I had a strong dose of my granddaddy Booker in my veins – a real fascination with tinkering. It was when I was exploring all the different departments that I realized it myself. During my time at what we call the Global Innovation Center, I was drawn to the practically limitless palate of tastes and flavors created by blending different aged spirits. My fascination became a passion, and I like to think that my granddad’s spirit of experimentation lives on in me today in my love of blending whiskey. After a while, I asked the company if I could come up with my own whiskey. I knew right away that this would be the foundation for my first release, Little Book. The name “Little Book” was the nickname given to me by my family when I was younger. I’m proud to honor my granddad and our family with this name. Little Book will be an annual limited release series that will feature new, unique blends that I’ve crafted and blended, uncut and unfiltered, in honor of my granddaddy, Booker Noe. Why blending? Blending offers an open canvas. Plenty of people are familiar with the taste of Bourbon, or Rye Whiskey or Scotch, but what would happen if these liquids came together? This is the type of question that I set out to answer when I started down this road.- Freddie Noe, 8th Generation Beam Family Distiller

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet grain, vanilla, subtle hints or orange, and a smoky finish.

text.data: Little Book will be an annual limited release series that will feature new, unique blends that I’ve crafted and blended, uncut and unfiltered, in honor of my granddaddy, Booker Noe
Why blending? Blending offers an open canvas Plenty of people are familiar with the taste of Bourbon, or Rye Whiskey or Scotch, but what would happen if these liquids came together?
Crafting this bourbon wasn't as difficult as previous years, because I had such a strong vision for the blend going into the liquid selection
In total, we teased 22 different blends in comparison to previous chapters where we teased more than 60

The base of the blend is a Kentucky Straight Brown Rice Bourbon The "High Rye" rye whiskey is an ode to Booker's Rye Ultimately, with the help of my father, we chose the 3rd liquid as a Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey

description.data: According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza Conmemorativo Añejo Tequila is a 100% agave tequila with an uplifting smoothness. Wood notes create a delightfully complex drinking experience only attainable by its aging process in medium toasted American oak casks. The bright amber tequila offers an aroma of dried fruit and agave nectar while lightly sweet toasted oak and vanilla can be tasted on the palate. A smooth medium body finish has a mildly bitter citrus balance. Ideal for margaritas.

tastingNotesText.data: Blend of smoky wood and pepper with a touch of agave

text.data: The Master Distiller carefully balances the agave flavors during double distillation in pot stills
The aroma offers fresh green apple notes followed by jasmine and hints of spice with a fresh agave taste on the palate
Taste: Highlighted sweetness, mild tannins, lightly sweet toasted oak and vanilla with mild astringency
Finish: Smooth medium body with a mildly bitter, citric balanced finish
Ideal for margaritas, Sauza® Silver has a fresh agave taste and can be used in countless cocktail recipes
Don Cenobio Sauza founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico in 1873 and became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world
Double filtration prior to bottling removes impurities and allows fresh agave flavor to come through

description.data: Cruzan Vanilla Rum is rich, robust and bursting with vanilla ﬂavor. The rich vanilla flavor adds a creamy, whipped taste to dessert-flavored cocktails like a Cruzan® Cheesecake, created by combining one and one-half parts each Cruzan Vanilla and Cruzan Raspberry rums with three parts cranberry juice over ice. Or try an Orange Dreamsicle by shaking one part each Cruzan Orange Rum and Vanilla Rum, one part JDK & Sons™ O3 Orange Liqueur and three parts half & half with ice. Pour over ice in a rocks glass and enjoy. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique ingredients and a unique distillation process.

description.data: Jim Beam Distiller's Masterpiece is a smooth, rich, full-bodied and mature Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey that's barrel-finished in Pedro Ximenez (PX) sherry casks, to add a dynamic to its taste that other bourbons can't offer. Bottled at 100 proof, it is a full-bodied bourbon that delivers, a smooth, rich mix of Pedro Ximenez (PX) sherry and matured bourbon flavors. description.data: Made in the Lowlands just outside of the city of Glasgow, Auchentoshan is Distilled Different. Auchentoshan is renowned as being the only distillery in Scotland to use a third still in the production of all of our whiskies, making it unique. This triple distillation produces a versatile, smooth, and light Single Malt Whisky.Triple distilled and aged perfectly for over twenty one years in American bourbon and Spanish sherry casks. This creates a refined Lowland Single Malt Whisky, ripe with gooseberries, sweet creamy vanilla, a hint of oak, warm honey, and the signature smooth, delicate, Auchentoshan taste

tastingNotesText.data: Light chocolate and soft green fruit, with a twist of old oak and honey.

text.data: Auchentoshan, meaning “corner of the field” in Gaelic, produces a versatile, smooth, and light Single Malt Whisky
When you taste our whisky, strong notes of fruit and citrus are revealed because we have reduced the impurities in the liquid through our triple distillation process
An approachable Single Malt, Auchentoshan appeals to new Single Malt drinkers who are already consuming other luxury craft spirits

description.data: Known for its innovative flavor choices, EFFEN Vodka is ahead of the curve once again with EFFEN Cucumber Vodka. With the essence of freshly harvested vine-ripe cucumbers, this flavored vodka creates a refreshing take on classic cocktails. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. It pairs well with melons such as cantaloupe or watermelon, can provide a crisp twist to a traditional martini and also mixes well with soda water, tonic or lemon-lime soda to create a cool, refreshing cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Vine ripe cucumber

text.data: EFFEN® Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN® starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN® is distilled continuously at temps below 85˚, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN® is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water
With the essence of freshly harvested vine-ripe cucumbers, this flavored vodka creates a refreshing take on classic cocktails

description.data: If you're looking for a smooth, sweet and easy-to-drink whisky, you've found it. Maker's Mark Classic Bourbon was carefully developed by sixth-generation distiller Bill Samuels Sr. to be just that. Still made to his unique recipe, this full-flavored bourbon is subtly woody with flavors of vanilla, caramel and fruit. It's easy to drink neat, and can pull its weight in a cocktail. Mix it with ginger ale and lime for an effortless long drink.This one literally changed the way we think about bourbon, all because one man changed the way he thought about making it. Bill Samuels, Sr., wanted a whisky he would enjoy drinking. Never bitter or sharp, Maker's Mark® is made with soft red winter wheat, instead of rye, for a one-of-a-kind, full-flavored bourbon that's approachably smooth. To ensure consistency, we still rotate every barrel by hand and age our bourbon to taste, not time. Just like Bill would have wanted. Once it's ready it's bottled at 90 proof, hand-dipped in our signature red wax. Just think of it as our seal of approval.Since its establishment, Maker's Mark has continually impressed critics, winning double gold at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition in 2020 and 2021.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and balanced with caramel, vanilla and fruity essence

text.data: Carefully sourced red winter wheat gives Maker's a unique sweetness
Years of aging in new, seared American oak barrels adds tons of flavor
Each bottle is still hand-dipped in our instantly recognizable red wax
Every drop is crafted at Star Hill Farm, Loretto, Kentucky
2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition Double Gold

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon

description.data: Kilbeggan® Single Grain furthers the spirit of innovation found within the Kilbeggan Distilling Co. family of whiskey, and serves as a tribute to the townspeople of its namesake. For two hundred years, the humble town of Kilbeggan produced a whiskey beloved the world over. But when tough times shuttered the distillery doors, the townspeople came together to keep the whiskey alive. They banded together to pay for the distillery license, and put years of hard work, late nights, and sacrificed weekends into bringing the distillery back to life. Their dedication to honouring the whiskey making traditions of the past while creating a better future inspired the creation of Kilbeggan® Single Grain. The notion that “single grain” describes a whiskey made with just one grain is a common misperception. Rather, the term refers to whiskey made in a single location using malted barley and at least one other grain. 94% of the mash bill for Kilbeggan® Single Grain is made of meticulously-sourced corn, with the other 6% being malted barley.

tastingNotesText.data: Wafer like biscuit sweetness, hazelnut and light spice with nice oak tannins drying on the side of the mouth.

description.data: Baker's Bourbon is a small batch, Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey distilled and selected in the traditions of Baker Beam, grandnephew of the legendary Jim Beam. Today, Baker’s is still made using this very technique and is aged only in the most select rackhouses for a robust bourbon flavor with a silky, smooth finish. Carefully matured for exceptional quality, Baker’s Bourbon is distilled at a lower proof, then barreled and aged in small batches to allow the bourbon to extract more toasted nut, fruit, and vanilla flavor from the barrel wood. With an aroma of fruit, vanilla, and caramel and a finish that’s sweet, smooth, and medium-long, enjoy Baker’s neat, on the rocks, or in a Manhattan, an old fashioned, or in other bourbon-based cocktails.

tastingNotesText.data: Toasted notes, vanilla, fruit, silky texture

description.data: Finely crafted at one of Jalisco's best-known distilleries, our Sauza Hacienda Gold takes tequila to a new level. It's sparkling gold in color and brings notes of sweet caramel and vanilla to the characteristic fresh blue agave flavor. Versatile enough to drink as a shot, it also makes the perfect secret ingredient in a cocktail. Mix with lime juice, orange juice, triple sec and agave nectar to create a Sauza citrus margarita to impress your friends.The soul of any tequila is in its agave flavor, and Sauza Hacienda Gold has plenty of it. The special extraction process helps keep the taste of the blue agave pure, fresh and crisp. After extraction, it's distilled twice in copper pot stills. This keeps the full agave flavor at the forefront. Finally, for this Gold edition, the spirit is aged in barrels to add its shimmering golden color and soft caramel flavor.As well as being at the forefront of tequila, Sauza has been a true champion of Mexican culture and its people since 1873. This is a distillery of "firsts". It was one of the first to put the name "tequila" on a bottle, and one of the first to export the spirit. Today, Sauza is proud to be a fresh take on tequila that everyone can enjoy, and welcomes everyone like they are part of the family. So, raise a glass to the three dons – Don Francisco Javier, Don Cenobio and Don Eladio – and celebrate the spirit of revolution and the spirit of connection

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, cooked agave and light toasted oak

text.data: A pioneering tequila from the Casa Sauza distillery

Double-distilled in copper stills to preserve natural Agave flavor
Flavors of fresh blue agave, sweet caramel and balanced pepper
Finely crafted in Jalisco, Mexico, for over 145 years

description.data: Laphroaig Select is a carefully chosen blend of five specially selected casks of our Islay Scotch, brought together in one special bottle. The combination includes four historic styles, perfected over two centuries by our passionate master distillers. Complex and deep, this Scotch whisky gently marries the spicy aromas of oak with the classic smoky taste of Laphroaig. Fruity, fresh and medicinal notes add to the flavor profile which is enhanced by the different types of cask aging. Best served alone or simply poured over ice, it's an excellent introduction to peated whisky. To make Laphroaig Select, our master distiller chooses spirit from five different casks. Casks tapped into for Laphroaig Select include Pedro Ximenez-cured hogsheads, Triple Wood Oloroso sherry butts and first-fill bourbon quarter casks. It's finished with our quintessential 10 year old Laphroaig and a new addition — single malt matured in new American oak. The latter is rarely used in Scotch whisky, and adds a unique twist to this expertly selected blend. Laphroaig Select pays tribute to two centuries of tradition from our distillery, which was founded in 1815 on the rugged isle of Islay off the west coast of Scotland. Laphroaig Select has won multiple awards including Gold at the 2019 San Francisco World Spirits Awards, Silver at the 2019 International Spirits Challenge and Bronze at the 2019 SIP Awards.

tastingNotesText.data: This full bodied whisky is initially sweet up front- matching the nose, then the classic dry, peaty, ashy flavours come bounding in

description.data: Featuring the rich flavor or fresh-picked raspberries, Cruzan® Raspberry Rum features the rich flavor of real, fresh-picked raspberries. Offering a sweet and pleasantly fruity taste with a mild tartness, pair this rum with fresh-squeezed lemonade to create a delicious raspberry lemonade. Mix up a Cruzan® Stroke of Midnight cocktail by combining one and one-half parts Cruzan Raspberry Rum with a splash of DeKuyper® Peachtree® and a squeeze of fresh lemon in a chilled flute. Top with sparkling wine and a single raspberry for garnish. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s.

description.data: Creamy milk chocolate adds an inviting layer to this light and delicious whipped cream vodka. It offers a sweet, airy and inviting aroma and a full bodied, creamy milk chocolate taste. Mix it with ginger ale or whip up a decadent martini for your next sweet escape. For a unique yet familiar taste, mix up a Pinnacle Chipped Chocolate Pancake cocktail by adding two parts Pinnacle Chocolate Whipped Vodka with one part half & half and a splash of maple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a chocolate curl. For a warm treat, try a Pinnacle Hot N’ Whipped Cocomint by combining one part Pinnacle Chocolate Whipped Vodka with one part DeKuyper Peppermint Schnapps in a heat-proof mug. Fill the rest of the mug with hot chocolate and top with whipped cream and crushed peppermints. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Creamy chocolate tase, and sweet aroma.

description.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means "smooth " in Dutch. Inside a bottle of original or flavored EFFEN Vodka you'll find a light, crisp vodka experience. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, even, balanced

text.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN is distilled continuously at temps below 85F, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water
Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate
Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Reposado Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Reposado is made from 100% blue agave and aged in large oak vats for at least two months for a smooth-tasting tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring notes of apple and herbs along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Reposado Tequila also offers a warm and slightly astringent finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita, Hornitos Reposado delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

tastingNotesText.data: Balanced agave with apple and herbal notes, slightly woody

description.data: DeKuyper Hot Damn! Cinnamon Schnapps Liqueur starts any night off with a bang. With its bold, delicious flavor of fiery cinnamon, this liqueur is the perfect way to warm up shots and cocktails. Extremely versatile with endless combination possibilities, the simple but distinct taste of cinnamon pairs with almost any type of mixer for a fun and spicy cocktail. Pair it with DeKuyper Peppermint Schnapps for a Fire and Frost. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Bold flavor of fiery cinnamon provides a warm and spicy finish.

description.data: Jim Beam Kentucky Fire is rooted in Jim Beam’s bourbon heritage, but delivers a new, fiery, sweet kick backed by the mellow smokiness of bourbon whiskey. If you’re looking to spice things up, Jim Beam Kentucky Fire is just the ticket. Our distillers created this signature mix of red-hot cinnamon liqueur and the world’s finest Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey. With a fiery hot candied cinnamon flavor and notes of oaky, smooth bourbon fire up any drink with a touch of sweet spice. Plus, it makes for one heck of a shot.

description.data: Take time to stop and smell the coconuts. Cruzan Coconut Rum smoothly blends high-quality rum with the natural, creamy flavor of coconut. The sweet, rich coconut flavor is a must-have for your piña colada and is also perfect for summer cocktails featuring tropical flavors like mango, pineapple, and banana. For a tropical twist on a classic, try a piña colada martini by combining one part each of Cruzan Coconut and Pineapple rums in a mixing glass with ice. Add a splash of pineapple juice, stir and strain into a martini glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, rich coconut with a clean taste.

description.data: John “Calico Jack” Rackham redefined the art of piracy. His career began under Captain Charles Vane, until Jack staged a mutiny and took control, destined for more adventurous pursuits. Calico Jack was the kind of man who set his own course and followed it however he saw fit. He went on to create the Jolly Roger flag and that black banner emblazoned with skull and cross swords, striking fear in the hearts of men everywhere should they be unfortunate enough for Calico Jack to approach.

description.data: With a balanced, juicy fresh melon aroma, Pinnacle Cucumber Watermelon Vodka offers the palate a taste of crisp cucumber and clean melon. This unique vodka dresses up any drink, making it a perfect choice for brunch, evening or any time. Stir into lemon-lime or club soda for a refreshing twist on a classic. For a refreshing cocktail, try a Pinnacle Summer Breeze by adding one part Pinnacle Cucumber Watermelon Vodka with two parts grapefruit juice and one-quarter part freshly squeezed lime. Shake with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a watermelon wedge. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Crisp refreshing cucumber with a subtle hint of sweetness.

description.data: Discover our Sauza Hacienda Silver, a finely crafted tequila from one of Jalisco's best-known distilleries. This crystal clear spirit is rich in fresh blue agave flavor. The agave taste is the soul of any tequila, and in Hacienda Silver it is met by notes of green apple, jasmine and fine herbs with bitter citrus for a mouth-watering  aftertaste. This versatile spirit can be drank as a shot, and also works perfectly in cocktails. Mix it with lime juice, triple sec and simple syrup for the ultimate margarita to enjoy with friends.Sauza Hacienda Silver is made from blue agave, using a special extraction process to keep the taste fresh, pure, and crisp. It's double-distilled in copper pot stills so the full flavor of the agave can shine through in every sip.Sauza has been at the forefront of pioneering tequila and a true champion of Mexican culture and its people. Launched in 1873, Casa Sauza is a distillery of "firsts". It was one of the first to export tequila, and also one of the first to put the name "tequila" on a bottle. Sauza is a fresh take on tequila for all to enjoy, one that welcomes everyone like they are part of the family. So raise a glass to the three dons – Don Francisco Javier, Don Cenobio and Don Eladio – and celebrate the spirit of revolution and the spirit of connection.

tastingNotesText.data: Fresh blue agave with green apple essence

text.data: A pioneering tequila from the Casa Sauza distillery
Crystal clear color with a hint of silver
Double-distilled in copper stills to preserve natural Agave flavor
Flavors of fresh blue agave, green apple, jasmine and fine herbs
Finely crafted in Jalisco, Mexico, for over 145 years

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Reposado Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Reposado is made from 100% blue agave and aged in large oak vats for at least two months for a smooth-tasting tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring notes of apple and herbs along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Reposado Tequila also offers a warm and slightly astringent finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita, Hornitos Reposado delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

tastingNotesText.data: Balanced agave with apple and herbal notes, slightly woody

description.data: Experience the well-earned, full flavor of Knob Creek 7 Year Old Kentucky Straight Rye Whiskey. This rye whiskey is patiently aged for seven years in deeply charred barrels and bottled at 100 proof for the signature Knob Creek full flavor. This full-bodied Kentucky features balanced black pepper, sweet vanilla and caramel notes with lingering oak and rich spice on the finish. Enjoy Knob Creek 7 Year Rye neat, on the rocks or in your favorite cocktails. This bottle of whiskey is 50% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly. Explore the entire Knob Creek Family for yourself and discover what whiskey was meant to be.

tastingNotesText.data: Bold rye spiciness with undertones of vanilla and oak

description.data: Smooth As Silk Since 1888. Created in 1888 by founder, Julius Kessler, Kessler American Blended Whiskey is the #2 best-selling American blended whiskey and is known for its smoothness. When it was first distilled, Julius Kessler even described its golden taste as “smooth as silk.” As a brand rooted in heritage, Kessler American Blended Whiskey has carried this trademarked slogan on its label since Prohibition, which truly describes the smooth, silky texture of this fine whiskey. Mr. Kessler’s picture and signature appears on every bottle to assure customers that the brand is still distilled according to the exact standards established by its founder. With superior quality and superior taste to match, Kessler American Blended Whiskey features a bouquet of warm apples and baking spice on the nose that leads to a rich, creamy body of oak and vanilla. Kessler American Blended Whiskey is aged for three years in new, charred white oak barrels and is bottled at both 80 Proof with a 40% ALC/VOL. Kessler American Blended Whiskey is best enjoyed neat, in a glass over ice or mixed in classic cocktails. Kessler American Blended Whiskey is available in multiple sizes including 200ml, 375ml, 750ml, 1L, and 1.75L – try it today!

description.data: Released in 1978, MIDORI was the main ingredient highlighted in “The Universe" cocktail, the first prize winner in the U.S. Bartenders’ Guild Annual Competition. Since then, MIDORI has gained an outstanding reputation among leading bartenders and cocktail designers worldwide for its excellent quality and superb versatility. Deriving its name from the word for green in Japanese, MIDORI is the original melon liqueur enhanced by premium Japanese musk melons. Its bright green color is distinctive, but the pleasantly sweet liqueur offers great versatility for cocktails, especially those paired with citrus and other fruits.

description.data: Looking for that satisfying apple crunch? Just add ice cubes.Apple and Jim Beam have come together to make history with the perfect balance of premium apple liqueur and bourbon, resulting in rich American heritage with a light, juicy twist. Surprisingly smooth and deliciously different, Jim Beam Apple is succulent but not overpowering. And because it retains a rich bourbon core, it’s perfect for both whiskey fans and those looking for a refreshing new cocktail. Enjoy Jim Beam's freshest family member straight, on the rocks or in a highball with club soda and a lemon wedge.After seven generations of master distillers, the Jim Beam family tradition continues today with Jim Beam Apple and more. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

description.data: Cruzan Mango Rum delivers the sweet, bold, tropical ﬂavor of ripe mangos. Exceptionally smooth and refreshing on a hot summer day, spend a little one-on-one time with this one. The tropical mango flavor pairs best with fresh fruit juices. For a new twist on a classic, try a Mango Mojito by muddling four chunks of fresh mango with 4-6 mint leaves with a splash of simple syrup; add a dash of freshly squeezed lime juice, one part Cruzan® Mango Rum, and ice. Stir and top with soda water and a mint leaf. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Finely crafted at one of Jalisco's best-known distilleries, our Sauza Hacienda Gold takes tequila to a new level. It's sparkling gold in color and brings notes of sweet caramel and vanilla to the characteristic fresh blue agave flavor. Versatile enough to drink as a shot, it also makes the perfect secret ingredient in a cocktail. Mix with lime juice, orange juice, triple sec and agave nectar to create a Sauza citrus margarita to impress your friends.The soul of any tequila is in its agave flavor, and Sauza Hacienda Gold has plenty of it. The special extraction process helps keep the taste of the blue agave pure, fresh and crisp. After extraction, it's distilled twice in copper pot stills. This keeps the full agave flavor at the forefront. Finally, for this Gold edition, the spirit is aged in barrels to add its shimmering golden color and soft caramel flavor.As well as being at the forefront of tequila, Sauza has been a true champion of Mexican culture and its people since 1873. This is a distillery of "firsts". It was one of the first to put the name "tequila" on a bottle, and one of the first to export the spirit. Today, Sauza is proud to be a fresh take on tequila that everyone can enjoy, and welcomes everyone like they are part of the family. So, raise a glass to the three dons – Don Francisco Javier, Don Cenobio and Don Eladio – and celebrate the spirit of revolution and the spirit of connection

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, cooked agave and light toasted oak

Finely crafted in Jalisco, Mexico, for over 145 years

Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Kanzen" or complete, Hibiki 17 Year Whisky is a harmonious blend of innumerous malt and grain whiskies which are meticulously blended to create a full orchestra of flavors and aromas. Hibiki, which means resonance in Japanese, is a shining, amber-colored 17-year-old whisky with exotic notes of pineapple, plum, raspberry, honey, and hibiscus on the nose and banana, pomegranate, custard, and pink pepper on the palate. Remnants of spice and finely-tuned grain notes smoothly deliver a balanced sweet, sour, and complex finale to every sip. Seductive, blossoming and enigmatic, Hibiki Whisky celebrates an unrivaled art of blending, fine craftsmanship and a sense of luxury from the House of Suntory. Whether you enjoy this whisky neat, with a hand-carved ice ball or cubes, or blended with water (Mizuwari), each taste is an experience to savor. Seductive, blossoming and enigmatic, Hibiki Whisky celebrates an unrivaled art of blending, fine craftsmanship and a sense of luxury from the House of Suntory. From its launch, Hibiki Whisky has been embraced as the paragon of The Art of Japanese Whisky, the very product of Japanese nature and her people. Hibiki Whisky is not only Japan’s most highly awarded blended whisky, but among the most prestigious and honored whiskies in the world.

tastingNotesText.data: Toffee, black cherry, vanilla, and Mizunara

description.data: This well-balanced, flavored vodka brings out the best of dark blueberry and bright strawberry. The aroma is a clean blend of sweet, dark berries while the taste bursts with flavors of bold, ripe blueberries and sweet vibrant strawberries. Add a clean, fruity punch to a fresh Pinnacle Triple Berry Tart cocktail by shaking with ice, two parts Pinnacle Berry Vodka with one-part DeKuyper Triple Sec Liqueur, one part cranberry juice and a splash of fresh lime juice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cherry. For a new twist on a brunch classic, try a Pinnacle Berry Screwdriver by mixing one part Pinnacle Berry Vodka with two parts orange juice and ice, garnish with an orange slice. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Tart ripe berries, with a hint of sweetness.

description.data: Cruzan Black Strap Rum features robust licorice and molasses flavors that add an exotic element to your tropical favorites. Best enjoyed as a finishing element or floated on tropical Tiki cocktails, popular pairings include flavors such as lemon, lime, ginger and pineapple. Featuring a deep black hue, it’s also great for adding a touch of rich color to drinks. Try a Cruzan Dark Tide cocktail by combining one part each Cruzan Black Strap and Single Barrel Rum with two dashes of Angostura Bitters in a shaker. Shake for five seconds, double strain into a Collins glass, add ice and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a mint sprig and a squeeze of fresh lime. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

tastingNotesText.data: Rich and aromatic with a strong and slightly sweet taste

description.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means "smooth " in Dutch. Inside a bottle of original or flavored EFFEN Vodka you'll find a light, crisp vodka experience. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, even, balanced

text.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN is distilled continuously at temps below 85F, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water
Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate
Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails

description.data: Laphroaig 25 Year Old Cask Strength is proof that good things take time. Slowly aged in ex-Bourbon barrels and Oloroso sherry butts, this Islay Scotch spends a quarter century resting in our warehouse on the edge of the Atlantic Ocean. Once it's ready, we bottle it without diluting it. Its lengthy time in barrel adds notes of sweet vanilla and spiced apple to the signature Laphroaig flavors of medicinal smoke and seaweed. Gentle sherry sweetness, imparted by the European oak Oloroso casks, helps to temper the powerful peatiness, and gently transitions into a fruity finish. This exceptional Scotch makes an ideal gift for any single malt lover. It is best served neat, over ice or with a small splash of water. Laphroaig is one of the few distilleries that still uses a traditional malting floor, and that's where this 25 Year Old single malt Scotch begins its life. The malted barley is dried and infused in the thick blue smoke of the peat-fired kilns before being mixed with the crisp waters of the Kilbride Stream. Once it's distilled, the spirit then spends 25 years slowly maturing in oak sherry and bourbon barrels where it gains complexity. Once a quarter century has passed, it's bottled at cask strength — so each sip tastes as it would if you sampled it at the distillery. The slow and steady aging of Laphroaig 25 is a testament to the distillery's history. It opened on the rugged island of Islay in 1815. For more than two centuries, our master distillers have worked to perfect the inimitable flavor of our single malt Scotch. With its concentrated flavors and smooth finish, this 25 year old cask strength expression does them proud.

tastingNotesText.data: Burst of peat restrained by a sherry sweetness that develops into a spicy apple fruitiness.

text.data: Bottled at cask strength for deep intensity of flavor
Peated single malt with notes of heather honey, wood smoke and spring flowers
Aged for 25 years in ex-Bourbon barrels and first and second-fill hogsheads
An ideal choice for purists, it's like tasting whisky at source

description.data: Don’t be fooled by the sweet blueberry taste of Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade--this rum packs a punch of flavor. Combining the smooth quality of Cruzan Rum with sweet fruity blueberry flavors and tangy tastes of lemon, this well-rounded fruity rum offers a citrus-sweet bite. Add one part fresh-squeezed lemonade for an adult twist on a classic summer lemonade or try a Blueberry Lemonade Cooler by combining two parts Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade Rum, three-quarters part fresh grapefruit juice and a small pinch of salt over ice in a shaker. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds, double strain into a Collins glass over ice and top with seltzer water. Garnish the cocktail with a twist of grapefruit peel. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

tastingNotesText.data: Well-rounded fruity flavor of lemon and wild blueberry with a tangy bite

description.data: Cruzan Mango Rum delivers the sweet, bold, tropical ﬂavor of ripe mangos. Exceptionally smooth and refreshing on a hot summer day, spend a little one-on-one time with this one. The tropical mango flavor pairs best with fresh fruit juices. For a new twist on a classic, try a Mango Mojito by muddling four chunks of fresh mango with 4-6 mint leaves with a splash of simple syrup; add a dash of freshly squeezed lime juice, one part Cruzan® Mango Rum, and ice. Stir and top with soda water and a mint leaf. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Haku is the Japanese craft vodka from the House of Suntory. The name Haku means “white” in Japanese and refers to the Japanese white rice that is the origin of the liquid. Moreover, it can also be read as “brilliant” – a tribute to the craft of mastering a clear, clean, and luminous vodka. Suntory has been making vodka since 1956, and Haku represents Suntory’s philosophy of craftsmanship, meticulous attention to detail, and commitment to quality. Haku is made with 100% Japanese white rice. It has 3 distinct steps in the distillation process. First, Japanese rice is fermented and distilled through a pot still to create a rice spirit in Kagoshima, Japan. Then, the rice spirit is distilled a second time through 2 different processes in a pot still and column still to create a uniquely flavored liquid Finally, the liquid is blended and then filtered through bamboo charcoal in Osaka, Japan. The resulting liquid’s taste profile is clean, soft, and smooth with a sweet rice flavor.

tastingNotesText.data: A rich taste that gradually envelops the mouth with the natural sweetness and complex flavour of the rice.

text.data: A soft aroma played up by the sweet, delicate, floral aromas of rice
A rich taste that gradually envelops the mouth with the natural sweetness and complex flavour of the rice
A smooth finish, with a sophisticated, pleasantly lingering sweetness due to the bamboo charcoal filtration process

description.data: Energize your cocktails with DeKuyper Crème de Menthe White. Mint leaves make this liqueur and cocktails made with it, undeniably smooth and rich, with a cool refreshing taste. Add it to your favorite cocktails instead of mint leaves for an extra boost of invigorating mint flavor. Blend it in an ice-filled shaker with vodka and pour into a martini glass for a bracing Victory Vodka Stinger. Add the same ingredients with Blue Curacao and half and half for a DeKuyper Mintini. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Refreshingly minty delight with a creamy finish.

description.data: With added vanilla extract, fresh lemon distillate and a touch of caramel, deep gold DeKuyper Amaretto takes this traditional liqueur to the next level. Showcasing a rich, amber color, this liqueur delivers the unmistakable aroma of almonds. Each sip of this complex and versatile liqueur carries sweet almond notes to hot coffee drinks, cold shots and colorful cocktails. Smooth and versatile, drink it on its own or add it to sour mix for a delicious Amaretto Sour. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. description.data: Cruzan Mango Rum delivers the sweet, bold, tropical ﬂavor of ripe mangos. Exceptionally smooth and refreshing on a hot summer day, spend a little one-on-one time with this one. The tropical mango flavor pairs best with fresh fruit juices. For a new twist on a classic, try a Mango Mojito by muddling four chunks of fresh mango with 4-6 mint leaves with a splash of simple syrup; add a dash of freshly squeezed lime juice, one part Cruzan® Mango Rum, and ice. Stir and top with soda water and a mint leaf. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: From Suntory’s mountain distillery, Hakushu 18 Year Single Malt Whisky is the herbal and gently smoky single malt. Its crisp and vibrant feel, unique in a single malt, enlivens and liberates your senses. With a silky mouthfeel, this deep gold single malt carries scents of ripe pear, dried mint, oregano, and a hint of smoke, carrying flavors of jasmine, mango, quince, and menthol to your palate. It finishes long and pleasantly smoky, with a hint of bitterness. Straight from the untouched forests, mountains and pure waters of the Southern Japanese Alps, Hakushu's crisp and vibrant feel, unique in a single malt whisky, enlivens and liberates your senses. Savor this whisky neat, on the rocks, or blended with water (Mizuwari). Keizo Saji inherited his father’s vision in his quest for innovation and constructed Hakushu Distillery in 1973, a half century after the first Suntory distillery, in the forests of Mt. Kaikomagatake.

tastingNotesText.data: Jasmine, mango, quince, and menthol.

description.data: Known for its innovative flavor choices, EFFEN Vodka is ahead of the curve once again with EFFEN Cucumber Vodka. With the essence of freshly harvested vine-ripe cucumbers, this flavored vodka creates a refreshing take on classic cocktails. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. It pairs well with melons such as cantaloupe or watermelon, can provide a crisp twist to a traditional martini and also mixes well with soda water, tonic or lemon-lime soda to create a cool, refreshing cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Vine ripe cucumber

text.data: EFFEN® Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN® starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN® is distilled continuously at temps below 85˚, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN® is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

description.data: Brighten any beverage with the distinctive fruit flavor of DeKuyper Peach Flavored Brandy. Perfect for sipping with friends, this fine brandy is crafted with premium peach distillate. Fresh with delicate ripe peach flavor, this brandy is perfect for fruit-forward cocktails with juicy fresh-picked taste. Shake it up with DeKuyper Triple Sec and lemon juice for a crisp and refreshing Peach Sidecar. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Pinnacle Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka offers a robust and succulent ruby red grapefruit taste with tangy citrus undertones. Try a refreshing Pinnacle Ruby Sunset cocktail by mixing one-part Pinnacle Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka, two parts lemon-lime soda and a splash of cranberry juice in a glass with ice and a lime wedge. Or create a Pinnacle Ruby Red Sea Breeze by combining one part each Pinnacle Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka, grapefruit juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass with a wedge of lime or grapefruit garnish. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Zesty citrus and sweet grapefruit.
