description.data: Classic and bold, Gilbey's Gin is an exceptionally balanced London Dry Gin. Classic juniper combines with citrus and floral notes, creating a citrus-forward, clean, light, and dry palate. Each sip finishes intense but smoothly, with lingering orange/citrus notes. During distillation, gin’s flavor is introduced to the alcohol when it is in a vaporous form and made to pass through a "filter" of juniper berries, herbs and spices. Distinct juniper and citrus notes make Gilbey's a staple for cocktails like the classic martini and gin and tonic, or serve it with fruit juice or fruit soda for a fun and refreshing beverage. It became such a popular gin throughout the world that a license to produce it in the United States was granted in 1938.

description.data: Three decades ago, Booker Noe set out to redefine the standards for pre-prohibition style bourbon and introduced Knob Creek. Today, we honor his legacy with the full flavor and extra aged Knob Creek 18 Year-Old. This limited-edition release celebrates the 30th Anniversary of Knob Creek, a milestone measured by time, effort, and commitment to the never-ending pursuit of craft. Knob Creek upholds the highest principles of bourbon-making with lower proof distillation, rigid warehouse barrel selection, and patient maturation for full flavor extraction. When the intentional way is the hard way, it’s the corners that haven’t been cut that make all the difference.

tastingNotesText.data: Full-bodied, caramelized oak with hints of sweet vanilla and baking spices

text.data: Aged twice as long as our flagship bourbon, Knob Creek 18 Year-Old is our most mature bottling to date
Our bourbon owes its rich copper color and deep notes of caramelized oak to its extensive aging in our Kentucky rackhouses
Experience Knob Creek 18 Year-Old for yourself and raise a glass to the pursuit of craft
Serving Knob Creek 18 Year-Old neat or on the rocks allows the depth of this full-bodied bourbon to unravel into notes of caramelized oak and sweet vanilla

description.data: Bowmore is a pioneering distillery. We continue to hand down the traditions, skills and expertise that were crafted in 1779, the earliest days of Scotch whisky. Home to one of the world’s oldest Scotch maturation warehouses, the No. 1 Vaults. It’s in this legendary warehouse that Bowmore single malts have been meticulously matured and transformed for over 240 years.

tastingNotesText.data: Rich and Intense. Sherried, complex and nutty. Hints of coca beans with sundried raisins. Muscovado sugar, red berries and an elegant layer of peat smoke.

text.data: Amid Islay’s wild beauty, the fierce seas and Hebridean winds, we’ve been handcrafting single malt Scotch whisky at Bowmore since 1779

An unrivalled heritage, the fresh water from the River Laggan, barley malted in our proprietary malt barns, perfectly-timed fermentation periods, and the magnificent character of Islay all come together to create Bowmore Single Malt Scotch Whisky

It’s in our legendary No. 1 Vaults that the magical character of Islay and centuries of tradition patiently combine to create a whisky that stands out for its complex balance of smokiness and minerality

description.data: Laphroaig Ian Hunter Chapter 2 is the second in a collectible series of exceptional single malt Scotch whiskies. It is drawn from the 1989 vintage, and has been aged for 30 years. Set inside a hardback book, this rare single malt Scotch comes with a chapter of the story of Laphroaig — and the characters who made it what it is. After spending three decades in vintage sherry casks, this peated whisky has developed a rich fruitiness. Flavors of dried figs and dates are underpinned with toffee and dark chocolate, along with the smokiness of cigar box. Serve it neat to savor the unique flavor, or add a splash of water to bring out notes of pipe tobacco and orange peel. This is a dram which deserves to be savored, perfect for special occasions. As you sip your single malt Scotch, you can enjoy reading the second book in this collectible series. It tells the story of Ian Hunter, an icon in Laphroiag's history. He was the last of the Johnston family to own and manage the distillery, between 1908 and 1944. This part of the book explains how his legacy endures and lives on in our whisky today. The Laphroaig distillery was founded by Donald and Alexander Johnston in 1815. For over two centuries the passion and hard work of master distillers like their descendant Ian Hunter have set Laphroaig apart as the richest of Scotch whiskies.

tastingNotesText.data: Sip it and enjoy sweet notes of manuka honey and stone fruit, with a touch of earthy pipe tobacco and zesty orange peel.

description.data: Pinnacle Habanero Vodka offers a spicy blend of habanero peppers with lingering heat and spice. Lightly acidic chili pepper touches the nose while the taste on the mouth has a slight sweetness up front with ripe and spicy habanero pepper on the finish. Add an extra kick to your Bloody Mary or create a vodka and tonic with a touch of heat. Try a Pinnacle Peppery Pineapple cocktail by combining one part Pinnacle Habanero Vodka with one-half part pineapple juice and one-quarter part lemon juice. Rim a glass with crushed sea salt. Shake ingredients, pour over ice, and garnish with a chili pepper. Pinnacle Vodka is everything you’d expect from premium vodka, but with none of the attitude and at a delightfully unexpected price.

tastingNotesText.data: Fiery, bold, and zesty with a spicy kick.

description.data: Prized in ancient times for medicinal properties, the aniseed in DeKuyper Anisette adds an exotic palate to traditional as well as modern cocktails. Distilled with imported aniseed and blended with fine neutral spirit, this liqueur's fresh black licorice flavor shines through. With its rich, deep flavor, Anisette makes a perfect addition to after-dinner cocktails. Update the classic Martini as a Black Anisette Martini, adding DeKuyper Blackberry and Vanilla with vodka, lime juice and muddled fresh blackberries, balancing sweetness with its distinctive flavor. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise with modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet, bitter, salty, sour, with a subtle smoky finish.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

description.data: Classic and bold, Gilbey's Gin is an exceptionally balanced London Dry Gin. Classic juniper combines with citrus and floral notes, creating a citrus-forward, clean, light, and dry palate. Each sip finishes intense but smoothly, with lingering orange/citrus notes. During distillation, gin’s flavor is introduced to the alcohol when it is in a vaporous form and made to pass through a "filter" of juniper berries, herbs and spices. Distinct juniper and citrus notes make Gilbey's a staple for cocktails like the classic martini and gin and tonic, or serve it with fruit juice or fruit soda for a fun and refreshing beverage. It became such a popular gin throughout the world that a license to produce it in the United States was granted in 1938.

tastingNotesText.data: Classic juniper combines with citrus and floral notes, creating a citrus-forward, clean, light, and dry palate. Each sip finishes intense but smoothly, with lingering orange/citrus notes.

description.data: Known for its innovative flavor choices, EFFEN Vodka is ahead of the curve once again with EFFEN Cucumber Vodka. With the essence of freshly harvested vine-ripe cucumbers, this flavored vodka creates a refreshing take on classic cocktails. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. It pairs well with melons such as cantaloupe or watermelon, can provide a crisp twist to a traditional martini and also mixes well with soda water, tonic or lemon-lime soda to create a cool, refreshing cocktail.

description.data: With winds of at least 137 knots, the Category 5 hurricane is unrelenting. In September 2017, Hurricane Maria ripped through the US Virgin Islands, causing severe damage to homes, communication networks, and the power grid. On Cruzan’s home of St. Croix, neighbors came together to help each other and renew their island, inspiring Cruzan Rum to amplify and sustain this “Island Spirit”. Bottled at 137 proof, Cruzan Hurricane Proof rum pays tribute to the resilient spirit that allows communities to stand strong in the face of disaster – a bold reminder that together we can weather any storm. Following the devastating 2017 Atlantic Hurricane season, Cruzan Rum established the Island Spirit Fund to ensure no community weathers a storm alone. A portion of proceeds from every bottle of Cruzan Hurricane Proof Rum supports disaster recovery efforts in the US Virgin Islands and across the United States. For more detail on the Island Spirit Fund, visit cruzanrum.com.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth and sweet.

Try it mixed with pineapple juice over ice for a refreshing and delicious fruity cocktail on a hot summer day. Try a Passion Fruit Passport cocktail by mixing two parts Cruzan Passion Fruit Rum in a blender with one-half part fresh lemon juice, two dashes of vanilla extract and one-third cup of ice. Blend until smooth, pour into a rocks glass and garnish with a brandied or maraschino cherry. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s.

description.data: Tres Generaciones 50th Anniversary Legacy Edition Añejo Tequila is a unique expression paying homage to Don Francisco Javier Sauza. Inspired by the 1973 original, this 2023 Tres Generaciones Añejo tequila was crafted using Don Francisco’s very own recipe and bottled in green ceramic bottles that are a modern take on the original ceramic decanter that helped put tequila on the world’s stage. This Añejo tequila starts with 100% Weber Azul agave which is slow roasted in masonry ovens, tahona crushed, double distilled in copper pot stills, and then patiently aged 14 months in seven-year-old American White Oak barrels specially selected and treated with an in-house charring process to enhance the essence and craftsmanship of this rare release. It is long and smooth and features highly complex and well-balanced notes of cooked agave, sweet vanilla, caramel, apples, almonds, slight smoke and well-defined tannins. The result is a tequila that’s 40% alcohol by volume reminiscent of the original launched in 1973, proudly carrying the Sauza Family’s trailblazing spirit in every sip. Enjoy neat or on the rocks.

text.data: Limited edition, double-distilled, Tres Generaciones Añejo Tequila made from 100% Weber Azul agave

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon

With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla and oak flavor with a lightly sweet finish
Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball

Sipped on its own or used as part of your favorite cocktail recipe, this ready-to-serve drink is perfectly blended for maximum flavor. description.data: Featuring the rich flavor or fresh-picked raspberries, Cruzan® Raspberry Rum features the rich flavor of real, fresh-picked raspberries. Offering a sweet and pleasantly fruity taste with a mild tartness, pair this rum with fresh-squeezed lemonade to create a delicious raspberry lemonade. Mix up a Cruzan® Stroke of Midnight cocktail by combining one and one-half parts Cruzan Raspberry Rum with a splash of DeKuyper® Peachtree® and a squeeze of fresh lemon in a chilled flute. Top with sparkling wine and a single raspberry for garnish. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s.

Whether your preference is over ice or with a mixer (might we suggest fresh citrus juice and a splash of club soda?), our Skinnygirl Tangerine Vodka goes down smooth and easy, with the delicious taste of a freshly peeled tangerine. Throw in some fresh sliced citrus to whatever concoction you design, and you’ve got yourself one low-calorie, amazingly refreshing vodka cocktail with natural flavors.

description.data: Experience the well-earned, full flavor of Knob Creek 7 Year Old Kentucky Straight Rye Whiskey. This rye whiskey is patiently aged for seven years in deeply charred barrels and bottled at 100 proof for the signature Knob Creek full flavor. This full-bodied Kentucky features balanced black pepper, sweet vanilla and caramel notes with lingering oak and rich spice on the finish. Enjoy Knob Creek 7 Year Rye neat, on the rocks or in your favorite cocktails. This bottle of whiskey is 50% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly. Explore the entire Knob Creek Family for yourself and discover what whiskey was meant to be.

tastingNotesText.data: Bold rye spiciness with undertones of vanilla and oak

description.data: Jim Beam Black is a premium Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey with a more flavorful character that’s made to be sipped and savored. Aged years longer than our original Jim Beam, Jim Beam Black has full-bodied flavor with smooth caramel and warm oak notes. This extra-aged bourbon has a balanced, rich and flavorful character with a deep mix of oak, cinnamon and vanilla aromas. The award winning flavor is best enjoyed on the rocks or neat. And of course, just like its younger brother, our original Jim Beam, it’s best when shared with others.

tastingNotesText.data: Full-bodied, heavier caramel, well-balanced, rich and flavorful

description.data: This aged rum is combined with a unique mix of nine spices creating a rich amber colored rum that delivers layer after complex layer of taste. Complex flavors of vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg and toasted wood offer a unique experience while the nine spices include: allspice, vanilla, pepper, ginger, mace, clove, nutmeg, cinnamon and juniper berry. Enjoy this uniquely spiced rum neat or add a hint of spice to your favorite cocktail. Try a Spiced Rum Punch by combining one and one-quarter parts Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum with four parts orange juice and one part cranberry juice over ice with a lime wedge garnish. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

tastingNotesText.data: Vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, warm spice and toasted wood

description.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means "smooth " in Dutch. Inside a bottle of original or flavored EFFEN Vodka you'll find a light, crisp vodka experience. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, even, balanced

text.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN is distilled continuously at temps below 85F, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water
Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate
Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails

description.data: DeKuyper Triple Sec Cordial brings the essence of orange to your favorite cocktails. DeKuyper's blend meticulously melds the flavors of sweet and bitter oranges from distilled dried peels for a one-of-a-kind liqueur. An essential ingredient in any bartender's repertoire, this cordial has a pronounced and lingering citrus taste. No margarita, long island iced tea, or cosmopolitan is complete without the distinctive orange flavor of triple sec. Since 1695, DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor, and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Pronounced and lingering citrus taste from distilled dried orange peels.

description.data: Elementary and world famous, DeKuyper Blue Curacao Liqueur is a solid basis for creating classic cocktails. Synonymous with island flavor, this DeKuyper favorite is harmoniously blended from distilled extracts of oranges, lemons, and Curacao fruit. The essence of this liqueur is the Curacao or Lahara fruit, famous for being bitter. Balanced for sweetness, this blue liqueur is incredibly useful in crafting distinctive drinks. Since 1695, DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor, and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Bitterness of the Curacao (Lahara) fruit is balanced with sweet citrus notes.

description.data: Bottled from a single cask and aged for at least twelve years, Connemara 12-Year Peated Irish Single Malt Whiskey offers an expressive aroma with a vibrant presence of malt and peaty smokiness. A smooth, melodious taste on the palate features a superb mix of fruit and peat while a strong spice bite in the finish dominates but doesn't overwhelm the creamy peatiness. Connemara’s whiskies are best described as “Islay meets Ireland” as they retain the smooth and sweet taste of Irish whiskey with the smoky taste associated with Islay Malt whiskies. Inspired by Ireland’s ancient distilling tradition of drying malting barley over peat fires, Connemara’s smooth, sweet malt taste and complex peat flavors make it a truly unique Irish whiskey. For centuries, peat (or turf as it is known locally) was widely used in Ireland to dry cereal crops and to fire the stills. Over the last century this tradition was lost until it was revived to produce world-famous Connemara Single Malt. Opened back in 1757, the Old Kilbeggan Distillery is the oldest licensed whiskey distillery in Ireland.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, melodious taste with a superb mix of fruit and peat.

description.data: Tequila 100% Puro De Agave. Hornitos Plata Tequila is a medium-bodied tequila proudly made in Jalisco, Mexico. Hornitos Plata is made from 100% blue agave for a smooth-tasting plata tequila. Hornitos was introduced to the world in 1950 by founder Don Francisco Javier Sauza in honor of Mexican Independence Day. Featuring playful citrus notes along with a strong agave nectar flavor, this Hornitos Plata Tequila also offers a short but smooth finish. Whether enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in signature cocktails, such as a Margarita or Paloma, Hornitos Plata delivers bold flavor in every sip. This bottle of tequila is 40% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly.

description.data: Starting in 2021, El Tesoro began releasing highly limited Single Barrel "Mundial" liquids each year, aging our award-winning tequila in casks from like-minded brands across the globe that share our commitment to craftsmanship and quality.For the 2022 edition, we built upon the foundation established in 2021, once again utilizing Laphroaig 10-Year-Old casks for the aging process. Instead of aging our Reposado for three additional months in the ex-Laphroaig casks, however, our Blanco tequila spent a full year resting in these storied barrels. The final tequila is slightly drier, with more of the smoky, peat influence from the Scotch. The core agave flavors remain richly prevalent as the center and soul of our tequila.The marriage of the rich, agave-forward profile of El Tesoro tequila with a touch of the unforgettable smoky complexity of Laphroaig will make this El Tesoro expression truly one-of-a-kind.

tastingNotesText.data: Roasted pepper, agave, maple, caramelized pineapple, barbecue, bacon, sea salt

Aged for nine months in ex-bourbon barrels and finished for four months in Laphroaig 10 Year Old casks

description.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means "smooth " in Dutch. Inside a bottle of original or flavored EFFEN Vodka you'll find a light, crisp vodka experience. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, even, balanced

text.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN is distilled continuously at temps below 85F, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water
Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate
Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

description.data: Smoother than any other rum of its proof, Cruzan 151 is aged for a minimum of one year in American oak barrels and is crafted using a meticulous process. Offering a strong, rich and pronounced flavor, this rum is best served with your favorite mixer. Try it mixed with tropical fruit juices like a Cruzan Voodoo Hurricane cocktail by combining one part each Cruzan 151, Aged Dark and Vanilla Rum along with three parts each orange juice and pineapple juice and a half-part of grenadine. Mix well, pour over crushed ice in a tall glass and garnish with a fruit wedge. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Versatile with a quintessential black currant taste, DeKuyper Crème de Cassis is essential for classic and modern cocktails. Made with black currant extract, this liqueur is perfect for rich flavor and red color to Champagne cocktails. Used as an antidote for snakebites in the 16th century, blackcurrant liqueur has come a long way. Over the years the cordial has been refined, without losing its unique sweet taste. Pour it with Champagne into a champagne flute or coupe for a crisp and sweet Kir Royale or mix with gin and dry vermouth for a crimson Arnaud. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Named for the Gaelic "beautiful hollow by the broad bay," Laphroaig Islay Scotch Whisky is born in a 200-year-old distillery on the coast of the island of Islay, with unique peat and water from the Kilbride stream. Laphroaig is one of only a few distilleries that still uses traditional malting floors, drying and infusing its own malt with the thick blue smoke from old peat-fired kilns. Enjoy this 32 Year Old treasure neat, on the rocks, or with a touch of pure, clean water.

tastingNotesText.data: Rich and silky core that marries fruit and spice. Chocolate, Sherry, peat and oak. With rich full-bodied finish.

description.data: Jim Beam Black is a premium bourbon that is, and always will be, extra-aged for taste and bottled only when it's just right. Jim Beam Black has a balanced, rich, and flavorful character with a deep mix of oak, cinnamon, and vanilla aromas. The result of the extra-aging is a full-bodied bourbon with an extra level of elegance and refinement that's meant to be sipped and savored. Enjoy Jim Beam Black neat, on the rocks, or in a cocktail - either way, this refined whiskey pleases with every sip. And, of course, just like our original Jim Beam, it's best when shared with others.

tastingNotesText.data: Full-bodied, heavier caramel, well-balanced, rich and flavorful

description.data: Drawing on centuries of tradition and craft, Kilbeggan® 18 Year Old Blended Irish Whiskey was distilled from the purest clear water and the finest malted barley and maize. A follow-up to the enormously successful Kilbeggan® 15 Year Old, this small batch, long-aged blend is an assembly of the very best malt and grain whiskey distilled at Cooley Distillery and gently matured in ex-bourbon casks in the ancient warehouses of Kilbeggan. It was skillfully blended to create a whiskey of unique smoothness, character and balance. Kilbeggan® 18 Year Old is one of the most highly-awarded expressions from the Kilbeggan Distilling Company. It was selected as the Best Irish Blended Whiskey two years in a row at the 2012 and 2013 World Whiskies Awards and also received Gold medals in the 2013 International Wine & Spirit Competition, 2013 San Francisco World Spirits Competition, 2014 New York World Wine & Spirits Competition, and 2014 Los Angeles International Spirits Competition.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and round, with complex notes of florals, citrus, toffee, and nuts.

description.data: Pour a perfect shot for any occasion with DeKuyper Washington Apple Shots. Crisp and tart, this shot is a hit at cocktail or dinner parties. Sipped on its own or used as part of your favorite cocktail recipe, this ready-to-serve drink is perfectly blended for maximum flavor. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise with modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Featuring the refreshing citrus flavors of lemon, lime and grapefruit, Cruzan Citrus Rum strikes a perfect balance between these three similar yet distinct flavors. Robust and tart, these crisp citrus flavors make a great mojito or simply add club soda and slice of fresh citrus for a refreshing summer sparkling cocktail. Try a Cruzan Sweet Tea cocktail by combining two parts Cruzan Citrus Rum, one-quarter part agave nectar and one-half part sparkling lemonade. Stir, chill and serve over ice with a twist of lemon. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Recognized as America's oldest continually maintained Rye whiskey, Overholt has seen a thing or two over the centuries. Produced, sold and marketed through pandemics, wars, and even through Prohibition, Overholt has been specially focused - consistent in quality and in spirit since 1810. From the beginnings on Abraham’s family farm in PA, to today’s production under James B. Beam Distilling Co. in Kentucky, the Overholt name continues to represent the strong-willed tradition of never cutting corners and the unwavering work ethic of our founder, Abraham Overholt, whose characteristic frown is reflected in his portrait that still graces the bottle today.

tastingNotesText.data: Full body with balance of black pepper, spice, coffee, char, and deep, dark fruits

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon

description.data: Experience the embrace of "Wa" oneness/harmony with Hibiki Japanese Harmony whisky. This careful blend of handcrafted Japanese whiskies  creates an orchestra of sweet, floral and woody flavors.Rose, lychee and sandalwood aromas tempt the nose, while each sip brings harmonious flavors of honeyed sweetness with candied orange and white chocolate. It's best served simply in the ultimate Japanese experience of Omotenashi. Pour into your favorite crystal rocks glass over a marugori: a hand-carved ice ball that melts slowly for a leisurely experience. It will transport you to Japan, where you can feel the harmony between nature and people. Hibiki Japanese Harmony is a meticulous blend of countless Japanese malt and grain whiskies, which come together in harmony. It pays tribute to craftsmanship and nature, and in particular, the 24 expressions of nature traditionally found in the Japanese calendar. This is further reflected by the distinct bottle, which has 24 facets.First created in 1989, to commemorate the 90th anniversary of the Suntory Corporation, Hibiki was destined to be the paragon blend. The name Hibiki means "resonance", and over the past three decades it has certainly made its mark. A winner of  numerous awards (ICS gold 2021 and 2020), it has taken its place among the most revered whiskies in the world.

tastingNotesText.data: Honey-like sweetness, candied orange peel, white chocolate

text.data: Blend of carefully aged Yamazaki, Chita and Hakushu Japanese malt and grain whiskies

Flavors of honey, candied orange peel and white chocolate
24-sided bottle represents traditional Japanese expressions of nature

description.data: A new and unexpected side to Laphroaig. For this series, our distillery team gives free rein to their imagination, creating the opportunity for some of our most fascinating notes to emerge. Explore the different elements that make our whisky unique as we take our signature profile into new territories. Elements 1.0 is the first in our new series, crafted through a 55-hour fermentation overseen by our Distillery Manager, using two varieties of barley malted and kilned in early autumn and nurtured by our expert team of mash men. The result is a bold, non-chill filtered, cask-strength Laphroaig revealing fruitier, sweeter notes behind our peaty, smoky style. Three key aspects amplify the flavour profile of the liquid in this first release. First, a combination of cloudy and semi-cloudy wort that layers in more tropical fruit notes without compromising on our peaty punch. Second a change in the size of the mash tun. In this case a combination of 8.5 and 11 tonne mash in a mix of styles from both today and the past. Lastly, Elements 1.0 is a 100% Islay malt that captures more of the maritime elements within the phenolics of the peat.

tastingNotesText.data: Spicy and peppery flavour on the tongue with hints of tropical fruit followed by wintery cloves and liquorice

text.data: Unlike any other Laphroaig, the result of our distillery team’s experimentation and passion

Two mash tun sizes used in a mix of modern and traditional styles

description.data: According to legend, when the Spanish conquistadors ran out of the brandy they brought from Europe, they began to distill a local agave drink, which became North America’s first indigenous distilled spirit. In 1873, this golden beverage was dubbed “tequila” by Don Cenobio Sauza, who founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico. He became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world, and today, Sauza offers a full line of tequila. Sauza Gold, one of the pioneer spirits from the brand, is double distilled in copper pot stills at low proof to retain the full agave flavor. It offers sweet aromas of caramel and cooked agave with a lightly astringent, sweet finish. Ideal for margaritas.

tastingNotesText.data: Cooked agave with sweet, caramel notes

text.data: Double distilled to specifically emphasize fresh agave notes using fractionating towers and pot stills
Color: Gold with sparkling  flashes of brightness
Sweet aromas of caramel and cooked agave are present with a lightly astringent, sweet finish
Taste: Cooked agave with sweet, caramel notes
Finish: A slightly astringency followed by a sweet finish
Ideal for margaritas, Sauza® Gold® has a fresh agave taste and can be used in countless cocktail recipes
Don Cenobio Sauza founded La Perseverancia Distillery in Tequila, Mexico in 1873 and became the first to export tequila to the rest of the world
Double Filtration prior to bottling removes impurities and allows fresh agave flavor to come through

description.data: To discover the future of bourbon, we had to go back to where the Beam story began. Jacob’s Well Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is the first edition of Hardin’s Creek, aged 184 months and crafted from centuries of whiskey-making experience and expertise. The result is a limited release blend of two ultra-aged expressions – traditional bourbon mashbill and high-rye bourbon – hand-selected from over 3 million barrels. Within each bottle, you’ll find notes of vanilla and caramel that offer a smooth finish and push your expectations, and the Beam legacy, in new directions.

tastingNotesText.data: Dried leather, spicy rye, and a hint of sweetness.

text.data: An ever-evolving series of releases that features some of our rarest and most unique whiskies, Hardin’s Creek will chart the rich experience and distilling knowledge of the James B. Beam Distilling Company
Hardin’s Creek is the birthplace of the Beam Family’s distilling legacy - the small creek flows into a river in the foothills of Central Kentucky, where Jacob Beam’s legacy was born in 1795
Over 227 years, eight generations of master distillers have built a deep well of whiskey expertise

description.data: Cruzan Mango Rum delivers the sweet, bold, tropical ﬂavor of ripe mangos. Exceptionally smooth and refreshing on a hot summer day, spend a little one-on-one time with this one. The tropical mango flavor pairs best with fresh fruit juices. For a new twist on a classic, try a Mango Mojito by muddling four chunks of fresh mango with 4-6 mint leaves with a splash of simple syrup; add a dash of freshly squeezed lime juice, one part Cruzan® Mango Rum, and ice. Stir and top with soda water and a mint leaf. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: Featuring a fresh aroma, intense flavor of almonds, flowers, berries and a smooth finish, this rum is a special blend of quality Cruzan Rum and the essence of black cherries. Smooth, sweet and tart, Cruzan’s Black Cherry Rum perfectly blends cherry flavors with Cruzan's signature distillation process for a tangy and smooth take on your favorite cocktails. Try it with cola for a fruity Black Cherry and Cola or a Cruzan Mai Tai that’s bright as the summer sun. A Cherry Pop, combines Cruzan Black Cherry Rum with aged light rum and garnished with fresh lime wedges and cherries for a citrus, sweet and tart touch. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique spirit of the island.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

description.data: John “Calico Jack” Rackham redefined the art of piracy. His career began under Captain Charles Vane, until Jack staged a mutiny and took control, destined for more adventurous pursuits. Calico Jack was the kind of man who set his own course and followed it however he saw fit. He went on to create the Jolly Roger flag and that black banner emblazoned with skull and cross swords, striking fear in the hearts of men everywhere should they be unfortunate enough for Calico Jack to approach.

description.data: Jim Beam Black is a premium bourbon that is, and always will be, extra-aged for taste and bottled only when it's just right. Jim Beam Black has a balanced, rich, and flavorful character with a deep mix of oak, cinnamon, and vanilla aromas. The result of the extra-aging is a full-bodied bourbon with an extra level of elegance and refinement that's meant to be sipped and savored. Enjoy Jim Beam Black neat, on the rocks, or in a cocktail - either way, this refined whiskey pleases with every sip. And, of course, just like our original Jim Beam, it's best when shared with others.

description.data: Bowmore is a pioneering distillery. We continue to hand down the traditions, skills and expertise that were crafted in 1779, the earliest days of Scotch whisky. Home to one of the world’s oldest Scotch maturation warehouses, the No. 1 Vaults. It’s in this legendary warehouse that Bowmore single malts have been meticulously matured and transformed for over 240 years.

tastingNotesText.data: Heather honey, Bananas, and peaches, with pineapple, vanilla and butterscotch.

text.data: Amid Islay’s wild beauty, the fierce seas and Hebridean winds, we’ve been handcrafting single malt Scotch whisky at Bowmore since 1779

An unrivalled heritage, the fresh water from the River Laggan, barley malted in our proprietary malt barns, perfectly-timed fermentation periods, and the magnificent character of Islay all come together to create Bowmore Single Malt Scotch Whisky

It’s in our legendary No. 1 Vaults that the magical character of Islay and centuries of tradition patiently combine to create a whisky that stands out for its complex balance of smokiness and minerality

description.data: Elementary and world famous, DeKuyper Blue Curacao Liqueur is a solid basis for creating classic cocktails. Synonymous with island flavor, this DeKuyper favorite is harmoniously blended from distilled extracts of oranges, lemons, and Curacao fruit. The essence of this liqueur is the Curacao or Lahara fruit, famous for being bitter. Balanced for sweetness, this blue liqueur is incredibly useful in crafting distinctive drinks. Since 1695, DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor, and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: DeKuyper Razzmatazz Schnapps Liqueur infuses your cocktails with a kick of fresh fruit flavor. Savor the elegance of a smooth cordial bursting with the juicy taste of fresh raspberries. Delicious on its own, with ice or as a mixer, it makes a sweet, pink accent to classic cocktails like the Cosmopolitan. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies, and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

description.data: Our old-school Jim Beam Rye recipe is marked by a warm, spicy kick and a bite of black pepper, all rounded out by hints of vanilla and oak. Add it to classic and contemporary cocktails alike for an unmistakable flavor. As a pre-Prohibition style rye whiskey, it pays homage to one of our family’s oldest recipes and is distilled according to the same exacting standards that have governed Jim Beam for two centuries. Today, it’s become a go-to for bartenders looking for a bolder, bygone take on whiskey with the smoother finish of more modern times.

tastingNotesText.data: Spicy and warm with a bit of a black pepper bite which gives way to vanilla and oak undertones

description.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means "smooth " in Dutch. Inside a bottle of original or flavored EFFEN Vodka you'll find a light, crisp vodka experience. Made from premium French wheat, EFFEN Vodka uses a continuous distillation process, along with natural ingredients to create a smooth taste on the palate. Designed by bartenders for bartenders, this smooth and vibrant vodka is the perfect base for mixing cocktails.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth, even, balanced

text.data: EFFEN Vodka is a super-premium vodka whose name means smooth, even and balanced in Dutch
EFFEN starts with a foundation of 100% premium wheat from Northern France – a pure starch that leads to a silky smooth liquid
EFFEN is distilled continuously at temps below 85F, creating vodka with no traces of burnt sugar
EFFEN is cut with pure spring water that has been purified through reverse osmosis, a process that creates technically perfect water

description.data: Versatile with a quintessential apricot taste, DeKuyper Apricot Flavored Brandy is essential for classic and modern cocktails. Made with premium apricot distillate blended with crushed fruit kernels and quality brandy, this fine apricot brandy is the essence of summer. Considered an aphrodisiac in Europe for centuries, the apricot's luscious curves, juicy flesh and sweet taste led people to believe that eating dried apricots or prunes unleashed the powers of love. Perfect sipping on its own, its fruity flavor shines through in an Apricot Caipirinha, or mingled with fresh lime and orange juice and soda for a refreshing Apricot Fizz. With a heritage dating back more than 300 years, DeKuyper Cordials & Liqueurs continues to be on the cutting edge of the spirits industry. DeKuyper's evolution has been successful through the combination of its rich, traditional expertise and modern innovation, creating mixable and versatile cordials, liqueurs, crèmes, brandies and schnapps made from the world's finest ingredients. DeKuyper has been the brand bartenders trust to add color, flavor and fun to any cocktail.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet with a distinct tart taste. With bold juicy flavor.

description.data: From Suntory’s mountain distillery, Hakushu 12 Year Single Malt Whisky is the herbal and gently smoky single malt. Its crisp and vibrant feel, unique in a single malt, enlivens and liberates your senses. Bright yet lightly smoky with the scent of basil, pine needles, and green apple, this champagne gold single-malt delivers notes of sweet pear, mint, and kiwi on the palate. With a woody finish, this Japanese whisky takes your palate back to earth with green tea and subtle smoke. Straight from the untouched forests, mountains and pure waters of the Southern Japanese Alps, Hakushu's crisp and vibrant feel, unique in a single malt whisky, enlivens and liberates your senses. Savor this whisky neat, on the rocks, or blended with water (Mizuwari). Keizo Saji inherited his father’s vision in his quest for innovation and constructed Hakushu Distillery in 1973, a half century after the first Suntory distillery, in the forests of Mt. Kaikomagatake.

tastingNotesText.data: Refreshingly herbal and lightly smoky. Aroma of basil, pine needle and green apple. Crisp sweet pear and mint kiwi taste.

description.data: Experience the well-earned, full flavor of Knob Creek 100 Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey. Knob Creek 100 Proof Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is aged nine years to draw out the natural sugars in charred white oak barrels. This full-bodied Kentucky bourbon features an oak aroma, a sweet, woody, almost fruity taste, and a long, rich finish. Enjoy Knob Creek Bourbon Whiskey neat, on the rocks or in your favorite cocktails. This bottle of whiskey is 50% alcohol by volume and should be enjoyed responsibly. Explore the entire Knob Creek Family for yourself and discover what whiskey was meant to be.

description.data: Toki means “time”, and this silky-smooth whisky lets you  savor the moment where old meets new Japan. Heritage techniques are met with an  innovative modern touch to create a subtly sweet Japanese whisky with a spicy finish. It's as vivid as it is innovative.It has fresh and herbaceous aromas of crisp green apple and basil, with each sip bringing notes of peppermint and thyme, grapefruit and green grapes. It's a wonderful way to make the classic highball cocktail by filling a glass to the brim with ice and gently pouring over Toki whisky. Top up with three measures of chilled sparkling water, poured gently along the side of the glass to avoid melting the ice or bursting the bubbles. Alternatively, sip it neat or over ice in your favorite crystal rocks glass.The Japanese respect for tradition and innovation can be seen in the unique way this whisky is made. It's a blend of a trio of whiskies from three renowned distilleries—Hakushu, Chita and Yamazaki. Mastered by Japanese craftsmanship, Toki is an innovative blend of Suntory Whisky. Pinpointing the moment where old and new Japan meet,  this whisky will transport you through time. Each drop is presented in a sleek, modern bottle which makes a striking addition to any liquor cabinet.

tastingNotesText.data: Grapefruit, green grapes, peppermint, thyme

description.data: Cruzan Vanilla Rum is rich, robust and bursting with vanilla ﬂavor. The rich vanilla flavor adds a creamy, whipped taste to dessert-flavored cocktails like a Cruzan® Cheesecake, created by combining one and one-half parts each Cruzan Vanilla and Cruzan Raspberry rums with three parts cranberry juice over ice. Or try an Orange Dreamsicle by shaking one part each Cruzan Orange Rum and Vanilla Rum, one part JDK & Sons™ O3 Orange Liqueur and three parts half & half with ice. Pour over ice in a rocks glass and enjoy. Based in St. Croix and operated by the Nelthropp family since the early 1800s, every bottle of Cruzan Rum captures the unique ingredients and a unique distillation process.

description.data: 225 years of experience goes into every bottle of Jim Beam Bourbon.An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined and smooth character. With a slightly spicy, oaky vanilla aroma, this medium-bodied bourbon brings mellow hints of caramel, vanilla, grain and oak flavor with a lightly sweet, toasted oak finish. Sip it neat, on the rocks, or mix it up with soda or ginger ale for a refreshing Jim Beam Highball.Jim Beam's extra aging creates an elegant, smooth and refined whiskey that pleases with every sip. This way of distilling is a family tradition that continues to this day after seven generations of master distillers. As the First Family of Bourbon, we were there when it all began. But we’ve never been the type to rest on our laurels. Always innovating, always taking bourbon to new heights—that’s the Jim Beam way. And after more than two centuries, we have no intention of doing things any differently. Since we sold our first batch in 1795, each of our family distillers has found an opportunity to push our story forward and keep the tradition of Jacob Beam alive for the next generation of bourbon drinkers.

tastingNotesText.data: Medium-bodied, mellow, hints of caramel and vanilla

text.data: Founded in 1795 and operated by one family for seven generations, Jim Beam is the World's #1 Bourbon
An aging process of four years in new charred oak barrels gives Jim Beam its elegant, refined, and smooth character
